title: About
text: Hey! My name is Logan Young-Glenn and I am a student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I am currently a junior, with a major in Sports Media and Communications in the College of Journalism. A few interesting things about me are that I grew up in Lincoln and I have worked at the Country Club of Lincoln as a player services member over the past three years.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Did Virginia Deserve to Make the 2024 NCAA Tournament?

net <- read_csv("netwl.csv")

chr (10): SCHOOL, CONFERENCE, RECORD, ROAD, NEUTRAL, HOME, QUAD 1, QUAD 2, Q...
dbl  (4): RANK, PREVIOUS, QUAD 1+2 W, QUAD 3+4 L

Code
teams <- c("Virginia","Pittsburgh","Wake Forest","Villanova","Indiana St.","Cincinatti","Oklahoma","St. John's","Ohio State","Seton Hall","Michigan St.","Texas A&M","Colorado St.","Nevada","Northwestern","TCU","Boise St.","Colorado")


bubble <- kenpom |>
  arrange(Rk) |>
  filter( Team %in% teams) 

head(bubble)
